headline: Solventum Corp (SOLV) Upgraded to a ‘Buy’ at Argus Research
summary: Solventum Corporation (NYSE:SOLV) is one of the 15 successful spin-off companies. On July 1, analysts at Argus Research upgraded the company to a ‘Buy’ from a Hold.’ The analysts also reiterated a $90 price target on the stock. The adjustment comes amid growing confidence that the company is enjoying robust growth. The upgrade underscores Argus […]
